fields.description: TestJobHistory.testJobHistoryUserLogLocation is failing, and there is an error in the log related to du failing in the mini MR cluster
fields.summary: du fails on Ubuntu in TestJobHistory
fields.environment: Ubuntu 8.10 x86_64, lots of RAM and HDD spare, clean SVN_HEAD of trunk

comments.body:
Trace of the output stream

2009-05-19 16:38:55,258 ERROR mapred.TaskTracker (TaskTracker.java:offerService(1187)) - Caught exception: java.io.IOException: Expecting a line not the end of stream

	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

The same error string pops up in HADOOP-5496, where the datanode refuses to play. On this linux box the DNs do come up, yet the TT is unhappy.

I think at the very least, the specific du command that failed should be printed out on an error, so we can see if it's the command at fault, or something else in the process.
as TestJobHistory is failing in trunk on hudson, without this du error appearing, it isn't the root cause of the test failing. However, an unexpected failure of du is odd. Downrating
